bias_characterization.interpretation: Method shows minimal bias for realistic GNSS scenarios

multi_center_consistency.interpretation: Independent processing centers show consistent results

correlation_length_separation.interpretation: TEP operates at physically distinct scales from geometric artifacts

signal_to_bias_ratio.interpretation: TEP signals exceed realistic bias by significant margin

key_findings: Realistic GNSS scenarios show minimal bias (R² ≤ 0.057)
TEP signals exceed realistic bias by 16.2×
recommendations: Acknowledge method limitations for contrived smooth surrogates
Emphasize multi-center consistency as primary validation
Present balanced sensitivity vs. specificity analysis
